sentences: Üks kord oli üht väike poiss.
Meie meelest on nad üht head sõpru.
Tema ja ta vend üht hästi.
context: The Estonian word 'üht' is a form of the pronoun 'üks' (one) used in certain grammatical constructions. It typically appears in contexts where things are unified, combined, or happening simultaneously. In these examples, it shows how 'üht' functions to indicate unity or combination - describing people being together, doing something as one unit, or having similar characteristics.
